ygData.subject: Re: Star Rubies - Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehehe thats great.  Last night in Unrest some guy was trying to auction off Star ruby earrings or rings cant remember which...he was askin 250pp for one or
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehehe thats great. Last night in Unrest some guy was trying to auction
off Star ruby earrings or rings cant remember which...he was askin 250pp for
one or the pair for 450pp.

I thought he was joking guess they are expensive.

----- Original Message -----
From: David <milamber@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 3:31 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Star Rubies - Spoiler


> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> posted today on eqenchanters list:
>
> *********************
> <snip>
>
> Some minor new info for everyone. After the patch there is now a Merchant
> that sells Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, and Sapphires as part of her normal
> items.
>
> It is M. Sparkle. She is located in West Commonlands in the small hut
right
> outside Befallen.
>
> Prices are as follows:
>
> Star Rubies - 156 plat
> Fire Emeralds - 204 plat
> Sapphires - 240 plat
>
> Hope this helps someone.
>
> Charles
> Xezol - Lvl 14 Dwarf Paladin on Prexus
> Xezol - Lvl 15 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
>
> <snip>
>
> David
>
